links.remarks:
When the scheme is file returns the string "null"
See docs for more info

When the username is not present in the input URL, the returned value will be an empty string
See docs for more info

When the password is not present in the input URL, the returned value will be an empty string
See docs for more info
For some protocols, when specified port is the default one, it will not be included. See docs for more info

Does not include the port number
See docs for more info

For some protocols, when specified port is the default one, the returned value will be an empty string.
See docs for more info

If there was a trailing slash in the input, it will be included.
See docs for more info

If there was a query in the input, the string will start with the prefix ?.
Otherwise, it will be an empty string.
See docs for more info

If there was a hash in the input, the string will start with the prefix #.
Otherwise, it will be an empty string.
See docs for more info

It always ends with a :
See docs for more info
It will contain all the parts of the URL mentioned above. See docs for more info
